title: And on the 3rd day, HotS got boring. Real boring.
body:
Anyone else feel this way?

I know they were going for a more casual approach but that...that feels like a dumbed down Moba. A moba you'd give to your 5 year old autistic cousin who can't sit still for longer than 3 minutes at a time without screaming "GET REKT SCRUBS!" A kind of moba that is exactly the reason why something like Dominion never took off.
